entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 70 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
